mapper.insert: INSERT INTO O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_REL_TYPE_M ( REL_TYPE_ID, DEL_YN, CRET_DT, CRETR_ID, CHG_DT, CHGR_ID, REL_TYPE_NM, DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM, UP_REL_TYPE_NM, REL_TYPE_DESC, OBJ_TYPE_ID, REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID, META_REL_CD, UP_REL_TYPE_ID, ATR_ADM_CD ) VALUES ( #{REL_TYPE_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DEL_YN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{sessionInfo.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REL_TYPE_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DOWN_REL_TYPE_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{UP_REL_TYPE_NM, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REL_TYPE_DESC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OBJ_TYPE_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REL_OBJ_TYPE_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{META_REL_CD, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{UP_REL_TYPE_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ATR_ADM_CD, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
